org.wattdepot.server.measurement.pruning

Class MeasurementPruner

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • org.wattdepot.server.measurement.pruning.MeasurementPruner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class MeasurementPruner
extends TimerTask
    MeasurementGarbageCollector - Removes measurements from the WattDepot repository that are at a higher frequency sampling rate than desired.
    Author:
    Cam Moore

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PRUNE_WINDOW
      The window to get the measurements.

    • Field Detail

      • PRUNE_WINDOW

        public static final int PRUNE_WINDOW
        The window to get the measurements. Hopefully allows for quicker performance.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • MeasurementPruner

        public MeasurementPruner(ServerProperties properties,
                 String gcdId,
                 String orgId,
                 boolean debug)
                  throws Exception
        Create a MeasurementGarbageCollector.
        Parameters:
        properties - The ServerProperties that define the type of persistence.
        gcdId - The id of the MeasurementPruningDefintion.
        orgId - The id of the Organization.
        debug - true if want debugging information.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there is a problem instantiating the WattDepotPersistence.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefinition

        public MeasurementPruningDefinition getDefinition()
        Returns:
        the definition

      • getMeasurementsToDelete

        public List<Measurement> getMeasurementsToDelete()
                                          throws IdNotFoundException
        Returns:
        A list of measurements to garbage collect. They are at a higher sample rate than desired.
        Throws:
        IdNotFoundException - if there is a problem with the MeasurementPruningDefinition.

      • getPersistance

        public WattDepotPersistence getPersistance()
        Returns:
        the persistance

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        Processes the command line arguments and runs the MeasurementGarbageCollector one time.
        Parameters:
        args - The command line arguments.
        Throws:
        Exception - if there is a problem.

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
        Specified by:
        run in class TimerTask

      • pruneMeasurements

        public void pruneMeasurements()
                       throws DatatypeConfigurationException,
                              IdNotFoundException
        Prunes the measurements.
        Throws:
        DatatypeConfigurationException - if there is a problem with DateConvert.
        IdNotFoundException - if there is a problem with persistence.
